cartel.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a group of people or companies who agree to sell something at a particular price in order to prevent competition and increase profits
cartel.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a group of companies who agree to set the price of something they produce at a fixed level in order to limit competition and increase their own profits
cartel.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The oil cartel, OPEC, had just had its first major success in forcing up oil prices.
